chunks.zh: 走亲戚太无聊，来点春节见闻
chunks.en: Visiting relatives is so boring, let's talk about some Spring Festival observations

chunks.zh:
1.县城这几年建了很多 30 层的高层小区。昨天路过发现一栋楼就一户亮了灯，还有灯都没有亮的。

1.1 10 几层的小区入住率也没有超过 40%

2.县郊还建了几座写字楼。。。

3.亲戚间谈话全是别人拆迁分了多少套房。



房地产的寒气还没有吹到 10 线乡下的样子。
chunks.en:
1. Many 30-story high-rise residential areas have been built in the county town in recent years. Passing by yesterday, I found that only one household in a building had a light on, and some lights weren't on at all.

1.1 The occupancy rate of the 10-story residential area has not exceeded 40%

2. Several office buildings were also built on the outskirts of the county...

3. Conversations among relatives are all about how many houses others got from demolition.


The chill of real estate hasn't blown to the 10th-tier countryside yet.

chunks.zh: 4.谈话都是别人在外面多少钱，实际老家房子就是个水泥毛坯。看起来报工资都是含税的。我报工资都去掉税（包括社保等），房租，吃饭钱😂
chunks.en: 4. The conversations are all about how much money others make outside, but the houses at home are just cement shells. It seems that the reported salaries are all pre-tax. I report my salary after deducting taxes (including social security, etc.), rent, and food money 😂

chunks.zh: 4. 催婚的不多了，经济不景气，丈母娘们大概都想明白了，找一个多金的女婿不容易。5. 路上开车的变少了，估计油费贵了，宁愿放着吃灰，骑电频车，也不愿意开车充面子，车已经变成了花瓶角色。6.走亲戚，大家都是吃完就回家了，等待吃饭的时间段，不是刷 dy ，就是在打游戏。7. 一个村庄里，基本没有串门了，大家都愿意待在自己的世界里。
chunks.en: 4. There are fewer people urging marriage. With the economic downturn, the mothers-in-law have probably figured it out; it's not easy to find a rich son-in-law. 5. There are fewer cars on the road. It's estimated that fuel costs are high. They'd rather leave the car to gather dust and ride electric bikes rather than drive to save face. Cars have become ornamental. 6. When visiting relatives, everyone goes home after eating. During the time waiting for meals, they are either browsing dy or playing games. 7. In a village, there is basically no visiting; everyone prefers to stay in their own world.

chunks.zh: 坐标江苏四线小县城，也差不多。大片小区晚上没几个亮灯的，但是问吧，就是小区全部卖光了，只是人家不住进来。城乡结合部，农村这些地方，就是讨论你们那边有没有拆迁的可能，他家拆了多少钱。
chunks.en: The location is a small fourth-tier county town in Jiangsu Province, and it's similar. Few lights are on in large areas of residential areas at night, but ask around, and the residential areas are all sold out, but people don't move in. In the rural-urban fringes, these rural areas, they discuss whether there is a possibility of demolition in your area and how much money his family got from the demolition.

chunks.zh: @hidemyself 确实，都是说没有降价。聊天全是想着买旧房子等拆迁。
chunks.en: @hidemyself That's right, they all say there are no price drops. The chats are all about buying old houses and waiting for demolition.

chunks.zh: 结婚办酒席的变少了，去拜年唠嗑听到好多闹离婚的
chunks.en: Fewer weddings and banquets are held. When visiting and chatting for the New Year, I hear many people are getting divorced

chunks.zh: 明显感觉消费少了, 我回家一周了, 还没去过县里新开的商场,去超市逛逛也没有消费 因为网上更便宜,和朋友聚餐吃饭就在美团百亿补贴上买券 人均 25 元
chunks.en: There is a clear feeling that consumption has decreased. I've been home for a week and haven't been to the newly opened shopping mall in the county. I didn't spend any money when I went to the supermarket because it's cheaper online. When dining with friends, I buy coupons on Meituan's Billion-Dollar Subsidy, with an average of 25 yuan per person.

chunks.zh: @wweerrgtc 消费倒是没有少，县城里过年前到处是逛街的。不过涨价还是明显的，出去吃早餐，价格没有变，分量少了 1/3
chunks.en: @wweerrgtc Consumption hasn't decreased, the county town was full of people shopping before the New Year. However, the price increase is still obvious. When eating breakfast, the price has not changed, but the portion has been reduced by 1/3.

chunks.zh: @Track13 #5 美团搜索"百亿补贴" 最近真挺便宜的, 相当于打八折
chunks.en: @Track13 #5 Search for “Billion-Dollar Subsidy” on Meituan, it's really cheap recently, equivalent to 20% off

chunks.zh: 是不是大家都出去旅游了。所以大过年的晚上开灯的也少。最好还是在平时非节假日的时候观察开灯户数比较靠谱。
chunks.en: Did everyone go out traveling? So few lights are on at night during the New Year. It's best to observe the number of lighted households on normal non-holiday days.

chunks.zh: @dya 不至于，平时路上车都没有几辆（没有行人，没有车，等着 90 秒的红灯）。只会更荒凉。几个高层小区都是这样。
chunks.en: @dya Not really, there are few cars on the road on weekdays (no pedestrians, no cars, waiting for a 90-second red light). It will only be more desolate. Several high-rise residential areas are like this.

chunks.zh: 我老家县城也是一堆高层，个人相当不看好
chunks.en: My hometown county town also has a lot of high-rises, and I am not optimistic about it

chunks.zh: 这几代人精神生活的天花板就是房地产。
chunks.en: The ceiling of the spiritual life for these generations is real estate.

chunks.zh: @wangkun025 其实都没钱，农村自建房拆了分了几套房其实还是穷，但长辈们都觉得富了。
chunks.en: @wangkun025 Actually, they don't have money. They are still poor even after demolishing self-built houses in the countryside and dividing several houses, but the elders all think they are rich.

chunks.zh: @Track13 已经不错了。抛开房产，天朝人民还是比较贫穷的。
chunks.en: @Track13 It's already good. Apart from real estate, the people of the Heavenly Dynasty are still relatively poor.

chunks.zh: @wangkun025 主要是都不愿出去打工。县城没工作。光有卖不出去的房子。
chunks.en: @wangkun025 The main reason is that they are not willing to go out to work. There are no jobs in the county town. There are only houses that cannot be sold.

chunks.zh: @Track13 嗯。财富会回到正常水平的。
chunks.en: @Track13 Yes. Wealth will return to normal levels.

chunks.zh: 除了大商场，路边小店都是初八上班。
chunks.en: Except for large shopping malls, small shops on the roadside are all open on the eighth day of the Lunar New Year.

chunks.zh: 第一点我觉得是因为在县城买房的过年回老家去了，而且年轻人可能是在县城买了房但是在城里打工平时也不怎么住。
chunks.en: I think the first point is because those who bought houses in the county town went back to their hometown for the New Year, and young people may have bought houses in the county town but work in the city and don't usually live there.

chunks.zh: @Track13 长辈是纵向对比，咱们这是横向对比。最好还是不要比，人比人气死人
chunks.en: @Track13 The elders are making longitudinal comparisons, while we are making horizontal comparisons. It's best not to compare, comparing people will make you angry

chunks.zh: 老爷只管有人买，有人接盘就行了，你住不住对他影响不大
chunks.en: The boss only cares if someone buys it and someone takes over the deal; whether you live there has little impact on him
